snippet: Laurie Anderson presided over a memorial for her husband, Lou Reed, on Monday at the Apollo Theater.
abstract: Jon Pareles notes Lou Reed's widow Laurie Anderson presided over his memorial at Apollo Theater; says event was celebration of what one speaker called legendary musician's 'complexity;' and family and friends reflected on his character and groundbreaking music.
lead_paragraph: Laurie Anderson presided over a memorial for her husband, Lou Reed, on Monday at the Apollo Theater.

headline.print_headline: Lou Reed’s Complex Spirit Is Invoked at a Reunion of His Inner Circle
headline.main: Lou Reed’s Complex Spirit Is Invoked at a Reunion of His Inner Circle
